hackathon-description-text: In teams, you will have to demonstrate your skills with the technologies of your choice in order to create an innovative solution using genetic data supplied to you by BiogeniQ on the day of the challenge.
hackathon-eligibility: You must form a team of three to five university students who are enrolled in the Winter 2018 term at a Canadian university. You will need to present a valid student ID card on the day of the event. More than one team per university can participate in the challenge.
hackathon-requirements:
In teams, you will have to demonstrate your skills with the technologies of your choice in order to create an innovative solution using genetic data supplied to you by BiogeniQ on the day of the challenge.
This challenge will take place over the course of a single day. You will need to present your solution to the judges, who will evaluate your work and nominate the winners, in programming, user interface development and presentation.
You will retain all ownership rights over the work that you create for the challenge.
hackathon-rules:
Each of the teams will present their solution by the end of the day.
A group of judges will evaluate each team’s results based on predetermined criteria.
The judges will allocate points, and the team with the most points wins the challenge.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=5 Place Ville Marie, Montreal, QC H3B 5M1, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: L'idée est originale, et montre une utilisation créative de la technologie.
La solution montre un certain niveau de complexité technique, et utilise une quantité suffisante de types de données.
L'expérience utilisateur est agréable, l'interface est intuitive et claire, et le visuel est poli.
La solution démontre une utilité réelle, et pourrait réellement aider la société.
La présentation de l'équipe est dynamique, démontre un niveau de préparation suffisant, est claire et concise, et respecte le temps alloué.

hackathon-location-address: 5 Place Ville Marie, Montreal, QC H3B 5M1, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Come participate in the genetic data games and take on the challenge designed by BiogeniQ, an innovative Canadian SME.
